original_title: Fata Morgana: Making of De Verboden Stad
overview: A unique look behind the scenes during the conception and development of the Fata Morgana dark ride in amusement park Efteling. Former employees share their memories and these stories are illustrated by a great many photos and video fragments, including never-before-seen footage of the construction, unique design drawings and a glimpse into various technical manuscripts.
title: Fata Morgana: Making of The Forbidden City
